mapper.select: select * from yd_goods_category where effective = '1' and is_show = '1' order by create_time

select id, image, store_name, store_info, unit_name, keyword, cate_id, price, cost, postage, sort, sales, stock, is_show, is_hot, is_benefit, is_best, is_new, is_good from yd_goods where is_show = '1' and effective = '1' and cate_id = #{id}

select id, image, store_name, store_info, unit_name, keyword, cate_id, price, cost, postage, sort, sales, stock, is_show, is_hot, is_benefit, is_best, is_new, is_good from yd_goods where is_show = '1' and effective = '1'
and ( store_name like concat('%',#{search},'%') or keyword like concat('%',#{search},'%') )
and ( is_show = '1' or is_hot = '1' or is_benefit = '1' or is_best = '1' or is_new = '1' or is_good = '1' )
order by sales desc

select id, image, slider_image, store_name, store_info, unit_name, keyword, bar_code, cate_id, price, cost, postage, sort, sales, stock, is_show, is_hot, is_benefit, is_best, is_new, is_good, description from yd_goods where id = #{id}
select id, goods_id, sku, stock, sales, price, image, `unique`, cost, bar_code from yd_goods_attr_value where goods_id = #{goodsId} order by id
select id as goodsId,keyword from yd_goods where effective = '1' and (store_name like concat('%',#{search},'%') or keyword like concat('%',#{search},'%'))
